_header: The well of virtue and flower of womanhood
_description: A secular treatment of a hymn to the Heavenly Mistress — four stanzas rhyme royal

Banna.First Lines:
The well of vertew and flour of womanheidAnd patrone vnto
                    patiens…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Ȝe beir þe name of landis of lenth and breidThe
                    well of vertew and flour of womanheid
